title: Where are all the Morgana skins? Plus a Morgana bug found.
body:
Can't find any Morgana skins in the shop at the moment even when searching. Anyone else having the same issue?

Also I've noticed a bug where pinging your ultimate status will display in chat as 'Ready' regardless if its pre 6 or on cooldown.

replies.body:
Restarted client and no difference but maybe you're right on the legacy part.

Yes, the ultimate bug has been happening for the past few days over all matches played with Morg.

Others can also see the utimate status as ready in chat even if the match has just started etc.
Are you on new client or old client?

I am not running into the same skin problem as you, perhaps try restarting your client? Most of Morgana's skins are legacy, it could be that you own the three that are available (and you aren't showing owned). 

As for the bug, has it happened to you in more than one game?
